query:
mutation {
				tokenPurchase(
					data: {
						amount: 1
						paymentMethodId: "cl7axnd5mbxcc09048mzvv25x"
					}
				)
				{
					tokenPurchaseTxn {
						id
						createdAt
						updatedAt
						paymentStatus
						amount
						charge
						totalAmount
						paymentCurrency
						paymentCustomerId
						paymentSourceId
						paymentChargeId
						paymentDescription
						paymentReceiptEmail
						paymentReceiptUrl
						paymentMethod
						paymentStatus
						paymentAccountLast4
						creditCardBrand
						creditCardExpMonth
						creditCardExpYear
						status
						value
					}
				}
			}
